q: these problems are correctable, Garcia insists. And time is on all these dogs' side.`` Some say if a dog is bred to do something, you can't undo that,'' Garcia said. But to me, that's like saying if everyone in your family has always fought in a war, you're a warrior and you're destined to do this. Not true. Everyone's an individual. You can choose your own path in life. Same with dogs. The only difference is, they can't choose it. We choose it for them. ___ Online: http://www.bestfriends.org Michael Vick Pit Bulls On The Slow Road To Recovery

This has nothing to do with competitors, that is completely false. This was my proposal. People have never believed that the three of us could run the company as a triumvirate, but[ this is] a very, very well-managed business. The three of us will be on all of the big decisions together. Changes at the top of Google are ultimately tactical matters. When he looks ahead a decade or more, Eric Schmidt knows that he is standing on the cusp of the next big shift in technological innovation.

On CBS's Face the Nation this morning, John McCain ( R-AZ) said, There is a lack of respect in our dialogue.... We shouldn't mistake passion for advocacy. In other words, passion is necessary in this debate that we're having, but we've got to make sure it doesn't spill over into personal attacks and impugning people's character or patriotism.
